bookTitle: The Chronicles of the Virago--The Novus: Book I
Plot: Makenna Grace Gold is just your average 12-year-old girl. That is, until she is told that she must protect her newborn brother and sister to safeguard the future of the world. Armed with a mysterious weapon, three Fairy mentors, and a wisecracking earthworm named Fluffy, Makenna must battle the forces of evil and became a defender for hope. Can Makenna truly be ‘The Virago’?
Characters: Makenna Gold--The Virago, Fluffy-wisecracking earthworm, Marigold Frith--Faerie Prelate, Bree Delphine--Faerie First-Class, Dee Delphine--Faerie First-Class, Sir Seaton--Multi-Billionaire Despot, Stephen Levine--Best Friend and Confidente, Heather Stern
